languages.text: {n}Комендант воздевает руку, и изувеченные люди начинают биться в предсмертной агонии.{/n} "Время слов прошло. Оптиматы, отдайте вашу силу Предвестнику Зари! Наши враги узрят истину — или умоются кровью!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Комендант воздевает руку, и изувеченные люди начинают биться в предсмертной агонии.{/n} "Время слов прошло. Оптиматы, отдайте вашу силу Предвестнику Зари! Наши враги узрят истину — или умоются кровью!"

languages.text: {n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"
languages.original_text: {n}Комендант воздевает руку, и изувеченные люди начинают биться в предсмертной агонии.{/n} "Время слов прошло. Оптиматы, отдайте вашу силу Предвестнику Зари! Наши враги узрят истину — или умоются кровью!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people on the pedestals start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

{n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people on the pedestals start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

{n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people on the pedestals start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

{n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people on the pedestals start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

{n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

languages.text: {n}典狱长举起一只手，那些身体残缺的人们开始拼命挣扎起来。{/n}“闲聊到此为止吧。我的信徒们啊，把你们的力量交给‘极光’的先驱者吧！让我们的敌人看到真相！或者让他们血流成河！”
languages.original_text: {n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}典狱长举起一只手，基座上那些身体残缺的人们，开始拼命地挣扎起来。{/n}“聊天的时间结束了。我的信徒们啊，把你们的力量交给‘极光’的先驱者吧！让我们的敌人看到真相，或者让他们血流成河吧！”

languages.text: {n}所長が手を挙げると、傷を負った人々が断末魔の苦しみにもがき始めた。{/n}「言葉を交わす時は過ぎた。オプティメイトよ、このオーロラの先触れに力を与えよ！敵に真実を見せよ…さもなくば血に染まるがいい！」
languages.original_text: {n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}監視者が手を挙げると、傷ついた人々が死にものぐるいで暴れ出した。{/n}「言葉を交わす時間は過ぎた。オプティマテスたちよ、このオーロラの先触れへと力を捧げよ！我らが敵に真実を見せつけよう…さもなくば、血に染め上げよ！」
{n}所長が手を挙げると、傷を負った人々が断末魔の苦しみにもがき始めた。{/n}「言葉を交わす時は過ぎた。オプティメイトよ、このオーロラの先触れに力を与えよ！敵に真実を見せよ…さもなくば血に染まるがいい！」

languages.text: {n}Der Wächter hebt seine Hand, und die verstümmelten Menschen schlagen im Todeskampf um sich.{/n} "Die Zeit für Worte ist vorbei. Optimaten, gebt Eure Kraft diesem Boten von Aurora! Zeigt unseren Gegnern die Wahrheit – oder ertrinkt in Blut!"
languages.original_text: {n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wächter hebt seine Hand, und die verstümmelten Menschen auf den Podesten schlagen im Todeskampf um sich.{/n} "Die Zeit für Worte ist vorbei. Optimaten, gebt Eure Kraft diesem Boten von Aurora! Zeigt unseren Gegnern die Wahrheit – oder ertrinkt in Blut!"

languages.text: {n}Le directeur lève la main, et les corps mutilés commencent à se débattre dans les affres de l'agonie.{/n} « L'heure n'est plus à la discussion. Élus, accordez votre puissance à ce héraut d'Aurore ! Que nos ennemis découvrent la vérité... ou baignent dans le sang ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le directeur lève la main, et les corps mutilés sur leurs piédestaux commencent à s'agiter dans les affres de l'agonie.{/n} « L'heure n'est plus à la discussion. Élus, accordez votre puissance à ce héraut d'Aurore ! » Que nos ennemis découvrent la vérité... ou baignent dans le sang ! »

languages.text: {n}El alcaide alza la mano y los mutilados empiezan a retorcerse con sus últimos estertores.{/n} «El momento de las palabras ya ha pasado. ¡Optimates, conceded vuestro poder a este heraldo de Aurora! ¡Que nuestros enemigos comprendan la verdad o derramen toda su sangre!».
languages.original_text: {n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El alcaide alza la mano y los mutilados de los pedestales empiezan a retorcerse con sus últimos estertores.{/n} «El momento de las palabras ya ha pasado. ¡Optimates, conceded vuestro poder a este heraldo de Aurora! ¡Que nuestros enemigos comprendan la verdad o derramen toda su sangre!».

languages.text: {n}Müdür, elini kaldırıyor ve sakat insanlar, ölüm sancıları içinde çırpınmaya, dövünmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Sözün bittiği yerdeyiz. Optimateler, gücünüzü Aurora'nın Müjdecisi'ne verin! Düşmanlarımız ya gerçeği görsün ya da kanla yıkansın!"
languages.original_text: {n}The warden raises his hand, and the maimed people start thrashing about in their death throes.{/n} "The time for words has passed. Optimates, give your power to this Harbinger of Aurora! Let our foes see the truth — or become awash in blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Müdür, elini kaldırıyor ve sakat insanlar, ölüm sancıları içinde çırpınmaya, dövünmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Sözün bittiği yerdeyiz. Optimateler, gücünüzü Aurora'nın Müjdecisi'ne verin! Düşmanlarımız ya gerçeği görsün ya da kanla yıkansın!"
